smac.model

Class InputQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • smac.model.InputQueue

  • public class InputQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    InputQueue defines a queue that is being monitored by the SMAC daemon.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bishan Kumar Madhoo
